function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","Impact":"Unpreparedness for disease outbreaks, leading to economic and social disruption","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and preparedness for potential viral outbreaks","Technologies":"Data analysis, surveillance systems, rapid diagnostic tools","People":"Government, public health organizations, global financial institutions","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, global financial institutions"},{"Description":"Scant evidence on economic and social impact of epidemics","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the full impact of epidemics on economy and society","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies and research on the economic and social impact of epidemics","Technologies":"Data analysis, modeling and simulation, economic impact assessment tools","People":"Economists, public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Global financial system volatility due to contagious epidemic","Impact":"Economic instability, decline in financial markets, high default rates","Mitigation":"Implement measures to stabilize financial markets, support borrowers, and reduce default rates","Technologies":"Financial modeling and analysis, intervention strategies, risk management tools","People":"Central banks, financial institutions, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Central banks, financial institutions, regulatory authorities"}]}
